vsParam:
Oh, these are the bombs we asked?
Looks powerful!

With [px]'s bombs, we will defeat the monster easily!
Let's hit the road, President Hazel!

Yeah, let's go kill that monster! [px]...
You'll wait for us to come back, won't you?

Sure!
We'll come back once we kill it!

... Hazel has been out for quite some time.
Is something wrong?

They'll be alright. They are pretty powerful and they won't be
defeated by that monster. Right, [px]?
Yeah. Maybe they'll come back in a minute...

Well done, Hazel, and senpais!
Are you hurt?

Yeah, no problem!
That monster is just a piece of cake for us, ha ha!

Don't get carried away.
We should thank [px], don't you think?

Thank you, [px].
Your bombs were a big help.

Thank you again.
It seems that we are not even close to your capabilities.
That's not important, I am glad you are safe and sound!
We won, that's all it matters!

Ho ho, yeah.
This is a victory of the entire "Academy"!

So... Everything in the canteen is free today!
Let's celebrate!

Wow, everyone is here.
Ho ho, I am so happy to see that.

Yeah, exactly. This is the "friendship" in the Academy...
Just like when I was a student... No, it gets stronger.

Yeah. It has become a tradition in the Academy
for everyone to work hard for the same purpose.

That's right! I hope that this beautiful "friendship"
can be passed down generation after generation!

So, let's go to the canteen.
After all, it's free today.

Ho ho, yeah.
I also want to closely observe the smile on everyone's face.
